channel.title: geotiff on Varun Pant
channel.description: Recent content in geotiff on Varun Pant

item.title: Using Geotiff as datasource via gdal
item.description: Recently, I have been working on algorithms which needs elevation data as well as Land Cover data, with world coverage. Google has an excellent elevation API however free usage comes with a limit. While searching, I came across a dataset in geotiff format for landcover as well as a processed version of world elevation. Elevation data comes in various resolution (250m,500m,1km), landcover is 500m . So how do we read it ?
